hadith.chapter: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh)) - كتاب التفسير
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا يحيى، حدثنا وكيع، عن هشام، عن أبيه، عن عبد الله بن الزبير، ‏{‏خذ العفو وأمر بالعرف‏}‏ قال ما أنزل الله إلا في أخلاق الناس‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Narrated `Abdullah bin AzZubair: (The Verse) "Hold to forgiveness; command what is right..." was revealed by Allah except in connection with the character of the people. `Abdullah bin Az-Zubair said: Allah ordered His Prophet to forgive the people their misbehavior (towards him).
